1237.question: What languages are represented in the dataset?
1237.response: {'Answer': 'The languages represented in the dataset are English (EN), Japanese (JA), Spanish (ES), Arabic (AR), Portuguese (PT), Korean (KO), Thai (TH), French (FR), Turkish (TR), Russian (RU), Italian (IT), German (DE), Polish (PL), Dutch (NL), Estonian (ET), Greek (EL), Slovenian (SL), Swedish (SV), Farsi (FA), Vietnamese (VI), Filipino (FI), Czech (CS), Ukrainian (UK), Hindi (HI), Danish (DA), Hungarian (HU), Norwegian (NO), Romanian (RO), Serbian (SR), European Union (EU), Latvian (LV), Bulgarian (BG), Urdu (UR), Tajik (TA), Marathi (MR), Bengali (BN), Indonesian (IN), Kannada (KN), Guarani (GU), Chechen (CE), Chinese (ZH), Chukchi (CKB), Icelandic (IS), Lithuanian (LT), Malay (ML), Sinhala (SI), Hebrew (IW), Nepali (NE), Khmer (KM), Burmese (MY), Telugu (TL), Kazakh (KA) and Tibetan (BO).'}
1237.answer: EN, JA, ES, AR, PT, KO, TH, FR, TR, RU, IT, DE, PL, NL, EL, SV, FA, VI, FI, CS, UK, HI, DA, HU, NO, RO, SR, LV, BG, UR, TA, MR, BN, IN, KN, ET, SL, GU, CY, ZH, CKB, IS, LT, ML, SI, IW, NE, KM, MY, TL, KA, BO
